list.label: FRom the first Promise of Christ, to restore life vpon death, brought in by the Serpent: vnto the seconde Promise made to Abraham vpon the death of Terah: whom first of the Fathers the Serpent drew to Idolatrie, are yeeres.
list.item: 2083. That space is recorded by the particuler Fathers.
list.label: From the Promise vnto the Lambe, appoynted to expresse the Lambe of God, are yeeres.
From the Lambe, to the beginnyng of the Temple: a shadow of the truer Temple, are yeeres.
From the buyldyng of it, vnto the burnyng: or rather the captiuitie vpon that, are yeeres.
Thence to the end of the Captiuitie, where Cyrus mad a decree of building it againe, are yeeres full.
Thence, vntyll the Temple of our Lord his body arose the thyrde day, are yeeres.
The whole summe is.
